TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ServiceRemotingExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class adds extensions methods to create for remoting methods of the service interfaces that are derived from interface.

Docs.typeparam: Type constraint on the service implementation. The service implementation must derive from and implement one or more interfaces that derive from interface.
Docs.param: The context under which the service is operating.

Docs.returns: A communication listener that remotes the interfaces deriving from interface.
